subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: One of the continuing trends in the major leagues is how diligent teams have become about safeguarding young pitchers like the Yankees’ Joba Chamberlain and Boston’s Clay Buchholz.
snippet: One of the continuing trends in the major leagues is how diligent teams have become about safeguarding young pitchers like the Yankees’ Joba Chamberlain and Boston’s Clay Buchholz.
